concepts.SERUM_CREATININE_(MG/DL)_12_DESC: Laboratory test that determines a blood serum creatinine level. Often used with BUN to assess kidney function. Units of mg/dL. If desired units are umol/L, use CIEL:790
concepts.SERUM_GLUTAMIC-OXALOACETIC_TRANSAMINASE_: Liver function test, which usually is used to detect liver injury.
concepts.SERUM_GLUTAMIC-PYRUVIC_TRANSAMINASE_14_D: Liver function test, which usually is used to detect liver injury.
concepts.GLYCOSYLATED_HEMOGLOBIN_A_MEASUREMENT_10: Glycosylated hemoglobin A (HbA1c) test is measured in percent and is gives an indication of average serum glucose levels over several months.
concepts.PLATELETS_15_DESC: Minute, nonnucleated, disklike cytoplasmic bodies found in the blood plasma of mammals, derived from a megakaryocyte and function to promote blood clotting.
